summary: A neural network wrapper that predicts coil sensitivity maps from complex multi‑coil MRI data using a configurable convolutional architecture (defaulting to a complex UNet). It trains on the fully sampled central region of undersampled k‑space and outputs sensitivity maps aligned with the specified coil dimension.
business_intent: Enable more accurate and efficient multi‑coil MRI reconstruction by automatically estimating coil sensitivities through deep learning.
